item.title: very simple caesar cipher in python
item.description: During a recent CTF I needed to decrypt a page encrypted with a Caesar Cipher. I didn’t know the what the ROT was and I was struggling to find an easy yet useful one around so I wrote this pure python one. Feel free to borrow it, steal it, claim it as your own or do whatever with it. Keep on sploiting, norsec0de #!/usr/bin/python # Very Simple Caesar Cipher # by norsec0de # # python .
